text: Sergio Iturriaga (born 3 August 1974) is a Chilean equestrian. He competed in the individual eventing at the 2008 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Chilean male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Chile Category:Equestrians at the 2008 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 2007 Pan American Games Category:Equestrians at the 2011 Pan American Games Category:Equestrians at the 2015 Pan American Games Category:Sportspeople from Concepción, Chile
title: Sergio Iturriaga
